page.title: 17ROUD
page.content: "Roud is the most beautiful place on the Island"quoted one inhabitant of the Roud area of our survey. Although one or two people were not too co-operative the general response was good. Only one young lady in Chale thought the proposed issue of a {motocross} would improve the town. No-one thought the bus service was up to scratch (although the survey was taken before the Bus schedules were altered-a new survey on this may be neccesary). Very few people in Roud had moved in recent years and even less were contemplating moving. Chale,however was different,probably because of the new housing Estate.
